Html: Hi sorry for English(and for t9 * digit in title) , i use this library to extract data from xls and put in a DB .why i have more digit (for example 0.75 in xls 0.753456 in DB)?

Probably because that's the actual raw value from the cell in your file..... If your spreadsheet has formatted this to 2 decimal places, and that's what you need, consider using getFormattedValue() to get the value from the cell rather than getValue()
